#id=1
#text=Carla decided to get her hair cut today .
#id=2
#text=So , she stopped by a nearby hair salon .
#id=3
#text=After saying hello to the hairdresser and waiting for a few minutes , she sat on one of the chairs that were now free .
#id=4
#text=The hairdresser next washed Carla 's hair with water and shampoo .
#id=5
#text=Once the hair was dry , she inspected Carla 's face shape and asked what kind of hair style she wanted .
#id=6
#text=They discussed this for about a minute before a decision was made .
#id=7
#text=The hairdresser then prepared the hair , separating it into different sections before she began cutting it .
#id=8
#text=She worked calmly and carefully , making sure that she would successfully achieve the style Carla wanted .
#id=9
#text=After about 30 minutes , the hairdresser had almost finished .
#text=So , she made last-minute touches by drying the hair using a blow dryer , and some final trimming .
#text=Once this was finished , Carla checked herself in the mirror and was very happy once she saw how nice her new hairstyle looked .
